When reviewing this document, review the procedures for balancing

cash and cash items, verifying cash on hand, and performing regular

and surprise cash counts. Bank procedures should include the

following items:
 

  • Require that all cash counts are completed under dual control.
  • Track all locations where cash is maintained.
  • Track who has authority and access to each area.
  • Require surprise cash counts to be performed on a different day each month.
